title: Vehicle-to-Grid (V2G) Pilot Program Analysis
description: An innovation manager is analyzing data from a V2G pilot program to assess its effectiveness and potential for expansion.

tasks.description: Aggregate data from the 100 EVs in the pilot, including total energy discharged to the grid and participation rates in dispatch events.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles the key performance data for the pilot.

tasks.description: Analyze the impact of V2G dispatch on the vehicles' battery degradation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a negligible increase in battery degradation compared to a control group.

tasks.description: Calculate the total revenue generated by the V2G services and the average earnings per participant.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a summary of the pilot's financial performance.

tasks.description: Write a summary report with a recommendation on whether to expand the program.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent recommends expanding the program based on positive technical and financial results.
